mapper.sql: G.FID AS id, G.FNAME AS name, G.FURL AS url, G.FMETHOD_TYPE AS methodType, G.FPARAM AS paramSchema, G.FHEAD AS heads, G.FSIGN_ID AS signId, S.FID AS signSchema_id, S.FNAME AS signSchema_signParamName, S.FTYPE AS signSchema_signTypeEnum, S.FPOSITION AS signSchema_positionEnum, S.FSIGN_ORDER_TYPE AS signSchema_signParamOrderEnum, S.FPARAM AS signSchema_paramNames, S.FSINGLE_PARAM_FORMAT AS signSchema_singleParamFormat, S.FBEGIN AS signSchema_beginCharacter, S.FEND AS signSchema_endCharacter, S.FSPLICE AS signSchema_spliceCharacter, S.FSIGNKEY AS signSchema_signKeyMap, S.FHAS_LAST_SPLICE AS signSchema_hasLastSplice, G.FTOKEN_ID AS tokenGrabId, G.FTOKEN_NAME AS tokenName, G.FUSERTOKENRULE AS userTokenRule, G.FTOKEN_POSITION AS positionEnum, G.FRULE AS grabExtractElement, G.FORIGINAL_RULE AS originalExtract, G.FSITE_ID AS siteId, G.FCPID AS cpId, G.FCREATE_TIME AS createTime, G.FUPDATE_TIME AS updateTime
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_GRAB
FNAME = #{name},
FURL = #{url},
FMETHOD_TYPE = #{methodType},
FPARAM = #{paramSchema},
FHEAD = #{heads},
FSIGN_ID = #{signId},
FTOKEN_ID = #{tokenGrabId},
FTOKEN_NAME = #{tokenName},
FTOKEN_POSITION = #{positionEnumInt},
FUSERTOKENRULE = #{userTokenRule},
FRULE = #{grabExtractElement},
FORIGINAL_RULE = #{originalExtract},
FSITE_ID = #{siteId},
FCPID = #{cpId},
FUPDATE_TIME = NOW(),
WHERE FID = #{id}
